direction.raw_text: What's with the bummer attitude? A nearby BUTTERFLY joins in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah -- nobody stresses out in Insectopia !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you say... Z (joining Bala) ...Insectopia? Z and Bala look around.  Just to get things straight, the garbage dump doesn't look disgusting -- that would be seeing it through human eyes.  Instead, we're looking at it through ant eyes -- and, reimagined this way, it's Paradise .  Not the ordered, sterile, paradise of the picnic, but an earthly land of plenty. The sides of the plastic garbage bags are sheer, reflective walls of smoothest obsidian...the garbage cans are gigantic, thick metal columns put there by the gods (think the pyramids); a coke bottle, refracting the sunlight into a gorgeous rainbow, trickles a fountain of sweet nectar into the pink, bittersweet flesh of a grapefruit half, which appears as a multi-chambered concave dome.  Everywhere, insects are disporting themselves -- a multi- species love-in that's like an insect version of Woodstock. Bala and Z are awe-struck.  Bala turns to Z.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: we made it!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: C'mon in!  The nectar's fine! Like a kid at an amusement park, Z slides down the smooth side of the garbage bag, whooshing this way and that until he slides into one end of a straw (a red and white striped tunnel), and is shot out ... Z Yippeeeeee! ...into a bottle-cap filled with lemonade, which he alternately drinks and swims through... Down at the bottlecap, Z is drying himself off.  Then he sees, emerging from behind a lemon peel, a gigantic TERMITE. Z (terrified)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !!! Surprisingly, the termite seems equally terrified...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, take it easy!  There's nothin' to be afraid of! Z Yeah, well, I make it a practice not to trust anyone who shoots acid out of their forehead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dude, here in Insectopia, we don't judge people by how many arms and legs we've got.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, back home, they called me a fruitfly.  But here, I'm known as... (with attitude) Superfly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anyway, big Gus is mellow. The termite sticks his hand out.  A drop of acid drips from his head and splashes at Z's feet. Z (taking his hand, disgusted) Charmed. Z reaches out and shakes the termite's hand, as Bala watches, smiling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So...you never did tell me...what made you come out to the worker bar that night?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just looking for fun, adventure, trouble, I guess. Z Well, "trouble" is my middle name. Actually, my  middle name is .985, but I don't tell people.  Hey, Bala, I...I actually have something of yours...you left it at the bar that night. Z takes out Bala's scarf, which he's been keeping folded in a pocket. Z Sorry, it's been through a war, not to mention everything else...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You held onto this all that time? Z Well, I...I know it's a little strange, but...I thought it might come in handy if I...needed a scarf someday. (embarrassed) Well, to be honest, I just liked having it. He hands it back to her.  Bala looks at Z, frankly, openly. For a moment Z is shy.  Then he looks at her too.  They're two lovers, leaning closer, about to have their first kiss, when -- BEETLE Hey Z ! The moment is wrecked.  Z looks up.  A chubby beetle stands there with Gus the termite.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wanna bring back dessert?  There's a thirty foot long blimp in the next can, made completely of chocolate! Z (annoyed) Sure.  I wasn't busy or anything. Z gets up to go with them. Z Great timing, guys.  Ever wonder why they call you "pests"? EXT.  INSECTOPIA, TOP OF CAN - NIGHT As Ant Team Six lands and takes up position above the feast. The tracker ant is going nuts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yesyesyesyesyes -- One of the commandoes puts his hand over the tracker's mouth to shut him up.  Mandible communicates with his troops by pulling down his one functional antenna and gruffly whispering into it, as though it were one of those commando headsets.  His troops do likewise.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Talk to me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've got a read on the Princess -- but target Z isn't accounted for.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's move in. EXT. INSECTOPIA - NIGHT Back at the feast, a cricket strums on his legs like a guitar, opining about life and the universe to a bunch of other chilled-out, hippyesque insects...Bala taps her feet to the song.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What if, like...we're just these tiny little things, and we're just like part of this whole other huge universe, that's like, so big we don't even know it exists?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Man...that's so deep... At that moment Ant Team Six rapels down from the top of the garbage bin, landing amongst the insects.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! The cricket gets up to confront Mandible, but Mandible cold cocks him with a right to the jaw.  The other insects, too surprised to fight, just do as they're told.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright, you hippy scum!  Make one move and I'll exterminate you! A couple of commandoes grab Bala by the arms and heave her up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop!  You don't understand!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't have to understand, Missy -- I've got orders .  Now where's Z ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Man, your girl is fly , know what I'm saying? Z (overdoing it) Oh, Bala?  I guess she's okay, you know, for a princess.  I mean, I usually date queens, or you know, empresses, because sometimes the lesser nobility are too much in awe of my smouldering sensuality.  Please stop me if I'm making you feel inadequate. They throw down the M&M, which lands with a THUD.  Z notices that the rest of the insects look spooked. Z What's the matter?  This place is as cheery as a Roach Motel at check-out time. Z looks around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bala's been kidnapped!  Some flying ants took her back to the colony! Z She's been kidnapped?!  But I can't live without her! Z just stands there, heartbroken. Z (determined) I'm going back.  I've got to get her. Who'll come with me? Z looks around.  Nobody's volunteering.  Nothing but sheepish looks and shuffling from the insects of Insectopia. Z looks disheartened.  He's about to leave when -- MALE WASP (O.S.) I'll go. The male wasp is hovering nearby. Z (surprised) You?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know what it's like to lose someone...I keep hearing the sound of Muffy's flapping wings...so I'll take you. Z hops on the wasp's back. Z Let's go, pal! The wasp takes off, leaving the other insects looking a little chastized.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Geez.  I feel like a real stinkbug.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wow...I never saw things this way... From here, we can see the whole layout of the land around the colony...the "desert" (an asphalt path) and across it, the "lake" (the overflowing water fountain) Z Things look so close together from up here...there's the desert...and the lake... (thinking about something) it's not far from the colony at all... Suddenly, the wasp bounces up and down in the air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry.  Turbulence. INT. FORMICA'S CHAMBERS - DAY Formica sits at his desk, going over some plans.  Formica's chambers are located inside a snake skull, with the eye sockets serving as windows, and the mouth serving as a door. The walls are hung with trophies -- the heads of other insects. Ant Team Six burst in the doors of Formica's office, carrying the struggling and kicking Bala.  One of the commandoes sets the tracker ant one the floor...then Formica gets up from his desk as the commandoes bring the princess to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Princess Bala.  Good. (with urgency) Where's Z? Bala replies warily.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's...he's dead. (covering for Z) You don't have to look for him anymore.  He was eaten by a praying mantis.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a shame he died prematurely...I was hoping to kill him myself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well you'll never be able to hurt him where he is now. (sadly) I miss him already.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You miss him? Why ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because...because he's twice the ant that you are.  I could never go through with marrying you.  I'm -- I'm an individual , and when I get married, it'll be to someone I choose. The soldiers look shocked.  For a moment, Formica looks furious.  Then he just shrugs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Princess Bala, I'm just a simple old soldier, and the ways of the feminine mind are a little too complex for me. But one thing I do know is, there are more Princesses where you came from. I just hope they're not all like you. In the meantime, maybe we can arrange for you to see Z again after all. He gestures to the commandoes, who drag her out the door.  We notice that the tracker ant has been left behind. EXT. ANT MOUND - DAY Z hops down from the wasp, who has landed near the entrance to the colony.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good luck, Z.  For a wingless insect, you're alright by me. Z Thanks, Chip. They shake hands and the wasp flies off. Z (to himself) How am I going to get in?  The place is crawling with soldiers! Z starts for the nearest entrance -- but he's spotted by a couple of SOLDIER ANTS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You there!  Worker! Z's caught -- it's over.  He turns around with his hands up. Z Don't bite!  I surrender!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doing out here!  All workers are to remain inside the colony, by orders of General Formica! Z can't believe his luck -- and his curiosity is piqued. Z (heading inside) Well...if you insist... INT. MEGATUNNEL - DAY The Queen, with Formica striding at her side, is carried by a personal escort of fifty or so struggling workers to the bottom end of the Mega Tunnel, where a red ribbon waits to be cut.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Very impressive, General. Behind her, hundreds of thousands of workers are crowded, looking confused and expectant.  Some of them clutch little flags and noisemakers...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wave that flag, you maggot! ...which we see are being handed out to them by Ant Team Six.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is there anything wrong, your majesty? The Queen is looking around unhappily.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's just...How I miss Bala.  I wish she were here for this special moment. Formica warmly places his hand on the Queen's shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She is, your majesty. She is . The CAMERA heads up the long, long tunnel, where we see... INT. MID SKYLIGHT TUNNEL Bala, tied and gagged.  She's at the point in the Megatunnel where it begins to curve upwards towards the surface.  She struggles against her bonds, but can't get loose.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Geez, this place really empties out in August.  Where is everybody? Z walks up to the skull that houses Formica's chambers and peeks in the eye socket. INT. FORMICA'S CHAMBERS Inside, the Tracker Ant, who's been left behind, switches "on", eyes glowing.  Z enters the chamber cautiously.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Z!  Z!  I smell Z! For a moment, Z's afraid.  Then he sees the small Tracker Ant doesn't seem hostile. Z You "smell" me?  Well look, I -- I've been out in the wilderness for a while, and -- The tracker ant keeps sniffing.  Z waves his hand in front of the blind ant's eyes. Z (getting it) Hey, wait, you're...you're one of those pheremone sniffers, aren't you? Maybe you can help me...I'm looking for a friend of mine, Princess Bala.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bala!  Yeahyeahyeahyeahyeah!  Find Bala!  Yeahyeahyeahyeah! Z picks up the tracker ant. Z Just remember, I met her first. Z, carrying the little tracker ant, heads out, following its lead... Through this and that passage, as the Tracker Ant gets more and more insistent...And finally straight to a blank wall .
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeahyeahyeahyeahyeahyeahyeah... Z Bala's through there?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bala...Yeahyeahyeahyeahyeahyeah... Z Great.  More digging.  This is why I left in the first place. Z can answer his own question.  He puts down the tracker ant, with a look on his face like a kid forced to eat broccoli, starts digging through the wall... INT. SKYLIGHT APEX - DAY Meanwhile, A member of Ant Team Six -- the stupidest member, in fact, waits at the very top of the tunnel , where it narrows almost to a point.  He's hanging from a winch, and has a little hammer and chisel in his hand.  He's WHISTLING, awaiting instructions. INT. MEGA-TUNNEL - DAY Z emerges from the tunnel he's dug, spits a load of dirt out of his mouth and wipes his hands off.  Nearby, Bala lies there, bound and gagged. Z Bala! Z unties Bala and undoes her gag.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !  You came back! They HUG. Z Why do they have you tied up here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's something going on, Z -- From here, Z can see far down the tunnel to where the crowd is gathering.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're having a ceremony to open the Megatunnel... We can hear the sound of WATER SHIFTING somewhere above.  He looks up the tunnel...in the distance, we can make out the silhouete of the commando set to break open the wall... Z Bala, that -- that lake we found -- I think the tunnel's right underneath it! (horrified)
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: : EXT. INSECTOPIA - NIGHT The insects are having a cookout , their faces illuminated by the still-red ember of a match .  Platters heaped with food lie untouched as they pat their bellies... Z and Bala sit next to one another, smiling shyly as if they had just met for the first time. Z
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. INSECTOPIA - NIGHT Z, the termite, the beetle and the fly are happily carrying a huge M&M back to the feast.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : EXT. SKY ABOVE COLONY - MORNING The wasp and Z fly high above the colony... Z
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. ANT MOUND - DAY Elsewhere in the colony, a column of soldiers marches by, and we hear the TROMP-TROMP-TROMP of their boots.  When they've gone, Z pokes his head out from behind a pile of dirt...he heads in the opposite direction of the soldiers... INT. OUTSIDE FORMICA'S CHAMBERS - DAY Z creeps around the outside of Formica's chambers.  This part of the colony seems to be deserted. Z
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Formica's going to flood the colony !!!  That's what he meant when said there were too many ants!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh no... Bala looks too shocked to move.  Z starts pushing her into the tunnel he made, and starts heading down towards the crowd.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !  what are you doing? Z I know it's crazy, but -- I can't just leave.  Don't argue with me.  If I've learned anything, it's that the problems of two people don't add up to a hill of ants in this world.  Or beans.  Something like that.  Anyway, I've got to warn the others . Z looks into Bala's eyes. Z Head for the surface, Bala.  If I don't make it, well...we'll always have Insectopia. Z kisses Bala.  Then he starts running down the tunnel towards the crowd...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Z!!! Wait for me! INT. ANT MOUND - DAY All the SOLDIERS are filtering out of the assembly area, leaving the workers behind.  As his troops march by, Formica steps to the side and hands the Queen a pair of scissors to cut the ribbon strung across the Megatunnel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your majesty, I'm afraid matters of state keep me from attending the ceremony.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But General -- this tunnel is your baby!  You're sure you can't stay ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 'Fraid not, your majesty. (with regret) Goodbye, your majesty.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Very well, General -- I know you -- all work and no play!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright, let's move out! Formica, surrounded by his bodyguards, hurries off as the Queen readies to cut the ribbon...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In the name of the colony, I declare this tunnel open! INT. MEGA-TUNNEL - DAY Z and Bala sprint towards the bottom end of the tunnel... Z Stoooooop! -- and then pull back to see Queen cut the ribbon -- she looks up and sees -- QUEEN Bala!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mom! Z calls out to the crowd. Z Listen up!  We've all got to get out of here!  This place is going to flood! The workers are unconvinced.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you nuts ? Z You've got to believe me!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh yeah?  What makes you so special, Mr. Know-It-All? Z I'm Z. The workers are even more sceptical.  A laugh goes up from the crowd.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're Z?  Gimme a break!  Z's ten milimeters tall!
direction.name: direction
